biography_text: WALTERS, Mimi, a Representative from California; born in Pasadena, Los Angeles County, Calif., May 14, 1962; B.A., University of California, Los Angeles, Calif., 1984; sales representative; business executive; member of the Laguna Niguel, Calif., city council, 1996-2004; Mayor of Laguna Niguel, Calif., 2000; member of the California state assembly, 2005-2008; member of the California state senate, 2008-2015; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of California, Los Angeles, Calif.
